sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e48cbe49db52b200f59974131f96194f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>updateGDSPRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	   var jsonObj = {};
	   var data = request.body.data;
       var request_id = data.requested_id;
       var sd_id = data.sd_id;
       var requestItem_id = data.requestedItem_id;

       var sri = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
       sri.addQuery("sys_id", requestItem_id);
       sri.query();
       sri.next();
  
       sri.u_director= sd_id;
       sri.update();

       var comments = data.approval_comment;
       var action= data.action;
       var role = data.role;

       var gr1 = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
       gr1.addQuery("sys_id", request_id);
       gr1.query();
       gr1.next();
       gr1.state=action;
       gr1.comments.setJournalEntry( '(' + action + ') ' +comments + '(role)' + role + '(ENDROLE)' + gs.getUser().getFirstName() + ' ' + gs.getUser().getLastName() + 'ENDCOMMENTS', "${jvar_my_sys_id}");
       gr1.update();
	   
	   jsonObj = {
		   status : 'successed'
	   };
	
	  return jsonObj;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/updateGDSPRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updateGDSPRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-21 18:42:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e48cbe49db52b200f59974131f96194f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateGDSPRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e48cbe49db52b200f59974131f96194f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:20:48</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_cab0852edb86ba00f59974131f9619fe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>fetchSavedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonData = [];
	var body = request.body.data;
	var requestedId =  body.requested_id;
    
	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
	gr_requested_item.addQuery('sys_id', requestedId );
	gr_requested_item.query();
	gr_requested_item.next();
	var value = gr_requested_item.u_value;
	var comments =  gr_requested_item.u_comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
    jsonData.push({
		value: value, 
		comments: comments
	});
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/fetchSavedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchSavedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 15:22:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cab0852edb86ba00f59974131f9619fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchSavedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_cab0852edb86ba00f59974131f9619fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:18:44</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getGDSPVariableIdArray</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var names=['investigator','email','phone', 'date', 'projectNumber', 'projectName', 'simpleSize','prospective', 'restrospective', 'human', 'nonHuman', 'germLine','somatic', 'dnaType', 'rnaType',  'microbiome', 'mitochrondria', 'otherType', 'specifyOtherType', 'snpArrayData', 'numSNP', 'expressionArray', 'numExpression','methylationArray', 'numMethylation','arrayDerive', 'microarrayData', 'sequenceData', 'somaticSnv', 'arrayCgh', 'wholeGenome', 'wholeExome', 'targetGenome', 'targetExome', 'wholeTranscriptome', 'targetTrabscriptome', 'epigenomicMark', 'sanger', 'rrna', 'association', 'arrayDerivedExpression', 'rnaExpression', 'derivedMethylation', 'otherAnalysis', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'individual', 'aggregate', 'notApplicableDataForm', 'arrayExpress', 'cancerGenomics', 'clinVar', 'dbGap', 'dbSnp', 'dbVar', 'ena', 'genBank', 'geo', 'mgi', 'sra', 'traceArchive', 'wormbase', 'zfin', 'OtherRepository', 'specifiedRepository','phenotype', 'exposure', 'clinicalData', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'protocol', 'specifiedProtocol', 'instrument', 'specifiedInstrument', 'surveyTool', 'otherCompanion', 'specifiedCompanion', 'dataCheck', 'publication', 'otherSubmission', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'noHumanData', 'noLimitation','limitedOnly', 'limitedPurpose','relateToDisease','orginId', 'version','rat', 'mouse', 'celegans', 'drosophila', 'yeast', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteria', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther'];

    var variables={};
    var email = request.queryParams.email;
	var gr = new GlideRecord("question");
    gr.addQuery("sys_updated_by", email);
    gr.orderBy("order");
    gr.query();
	
	while(gr.next()){
	   var name =  gr.getValue('name');
	   for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		   if(name == names[i]){
				variables[name] = gr.getValue('sys_id');
				break;
		   }
	   }
	}
	var jsonArr = [];
	jsonArr.push({
		itemId: variables
	});
	
	return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getGDSPVariableIdArray</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getGDSPVariableIdArray</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-14 16:33:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getGDSPVariableIdArray</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:19:33</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>::-ms-clear {
  display: none;
}

::-ms-reveal {
  display: none;
}

body {
  height: 100%;
}

#pageTitle {
  color: #FFFFFF;
}

#pageTitle:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

#navbar li {
  font-size: 120%;
}

#feedbackButton { 
  margin-left: -30px;
  height: 40px; 
  width: 104px; 
  position: fixed; 
  top: 45%; 
  z-index: 999;
  transform: rotate(-90deg);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg); 
  -moz-transform: rotate(-90deg); 
  -o-transform: rotate(-90deg); 
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=3);
}

#feedbackButton a { 
  display: block; 
  //background: #f00; 
  background-color: #EEEEEE;
  border-radius: 4px;
  height: 40px; 
  width: 110px; 
  padding: 8px 16px;
  color: #333333; 
  //font-family: Arial, sans-serif; 
  font-size: 17px; 
  font-weight: bold; 
  text-decoration: none; 
  border-bottom: solid 1px #333;
  border-left: solid 1px #333;
  border-right: solid 1px #fff;
}

#feedbackButton a:hover { 
  opacity: 0.75; 
}

.fixedWidth {
   width:80%; 
}

.fa-mandatory {
  color: #D9534F;
}

.well {
  padding-top: 0 !important;
}

.panel {
  border: 0 !important;
}

.alert a:not(.close) {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

body .header {
  color: #EEEEEE;
}

body .footer {
  color: #EEEEEE;
  //font-size: 110%;
}

body .footer a {
  color: #EEEEEE;
}

body .footer h2 u {
  color: #FFFFFF;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.footer-column::before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  border-left: 1px solid #666666;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  height: 160px;
}

.tile-flip-off {
  display: none;
}

.panel a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.tile-home {
  border-radius: 4px;
}

  height: 150px;

}

}

  background-color: #EEEEEE;
  height: 100px;
}

  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}

#filterAccordion #a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.tile-item .tile-request {
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
  color: #333333;
  border-radius: 4px;
  height: 100px;

}

  height: 100px;

  background-position: left;
  padding-left: 125px;
}

.tile-item[category="Telecommunications"] .tile-request {

  background-position: left;

.list-item[category="Non-Scientific Software"] .tile-request {

  background-position: left;
}

.list-item[category="Telecommunications"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_telecommunications.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

#orderVariables a {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.twitter-typeahead {
  width: 100%;
}

.tt-hint {
  background-color: #F00;
}

.tt-menu {
  background-color: #FFF;
  width: 345px;
  border: 1px solid black;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #BBB;
}

.tt-suggestion:hover {

}

.tt-cursor {

}
.tools-owner-title {
    padding-top: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    background-color: #F5FAFF;
    color: #0C5C97;
}
footer {
    text-align: center;
}

.footer {
    bottom: 0;
    color: #444;
    padding:25px 0;
}
.footer ul {
    text-align: center;
}
.footer ul li a {
    color: #444;
}
.tools-section {
    padding: 0 20px 10px 20px;
/*
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
*/

/*

*/
}
fieldset.scheduler-border {
    border: 1px groove #ddd !important;
    padding: 0 1.4em 1.4em 1.4em !important;
    margin: 0 0 1.5em 0 !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow:  0px 0px 0px 0px #000;
            box-shadow:  0px 0px 0px 0px #000;
}

legend.scheduler-border {
     width:inherit; /* Or auto */
    padding:0 10px; /* To give a bit of padding on the left and right */

}

return false; } } if($('#yeast').is(":checked")){ if($('#yeastSpecies').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#yeastSpecies').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } if($('#bacteria').is(":checked")){ if($('#bacteriaSpecies').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#bacteriaSpecies').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } if($('#nonHuman').is(":checked")){ if($('#noHumanOther').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#noHumanOther').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } return true; }else{ return false; }else{ return false; } } function validateAnalysisOther(){ if($('#association').is(":checked") || $('#arrayDerivedExpression').is(":checked") || $('#rnaExpression').is(":checked") || $('#derivedMethylation').is(":checked") || $('#otherAnalysis').is(":checked")){ if($('#otherAnalysis').is(":checked")){ if( $('#spcifiedOtherAnalysis').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#spcifiedOtherAnalysis').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } return true; }else{ return false; } } function validateDataForm(){ if($('#individual').is(":checked") || $('#aggregate').is(":checked") || $('#notApplicableDataForm').is(":checked")){ return true; }else{ return false; } } function validateDataRepository(){ if($('#arrayExpress').is(":checked") || $('#cancerGenomics').is(":checked") || $('#clinVar').is(":checked") || $('#dbGap').is(":checked") || $('#dbSnp').is(":checked") || $('#dbVar').is(":checked") || $('#ena').is(":checked") || $('#geo').is(":checked") || $('#mgi').is(":checked") || $('#genBank').is(":checked") || $('#traceArchive').is(":checked") || $('#wormbase').is(":checked") || $('#sra').is(":checked") || $('#zfin').is(":checked") || $('#OtherRepository').is(":checked") ){ if($('#OtherRepository').is(":checked")){ if( $('#specifiedRepository').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#specifiedRepository').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } return true; }else{ return false; } } function validateCompanion(){ if($('#phenotype').is(":checked") || $('#exposure').is(":checked") || $('#surveyTool').is(":checked") || $('#clinicalData').is(":checked") || $('#protocol').is(":checked") || $('#instrument').is(":checked") || $('#otherCompanion').is(":checked")){ if($('#clinicalData').is(":checked")){ if( $('#specifiedClinicalData').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#specifiedClinicalData').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } if($('#protocol').is(":checked")){ if( $('#specifiedProtocol').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#specifiedProtocol').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } if($('#instrument').is(":checked")){ if( $('#specifiedInstrument').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#specifiedInstrument').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } if($('#otherCompanion').is(":checked")){ if( $('#specifiedCompanion').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#specifiedCompanion').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } return true; }else{ return false; } } function validateDataSubmission(){ if($('#dataCheck').is(":checked") || $('#publication').is(":checked") || $('#otherSubmission').is(":checked")){ if($('#otherSubmission').is(":checked")){ if( $('#psecifiedOtherSubmission').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#psecifiedOtherSubmission').css("background-color", "yellow"); return false; } } return true; }else{ return false; } } function validateDataUseLimitation(){ if($('#noHumanData').is(":checked") || $('#noLimitation').is(":checked") || $('#limitedOnly').is(":checked") || $('#limitedPurpose').is(":checked") || $('#relateToDisease').is(":checked")){ return true; }else{ return false; } } function formatHistoricComment(comment){ if(comment.length>= 50){ var index = comment.indexOf('Added comment to Approval record:'); return comment.substring(index); }else{ return ' '; } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(value == ''){ return ''; } var values = ''; if(flag == '0'){ values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } function removeSavedRecordAfterSubmit(){ var id = $('#saved_id').val(); var data = { saved_id: id, action: 'DELETE' }; var request = { method: 'POST', url: '/api/naci/gdspapi/saveRequestData', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: data }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response) { var result = response.data.result; console.log(result); } function handleError(response) { console.error(response); //$confirm.modal('hide'); alert('ERROR'); } } }]]>c.btn-form { width: 100px; margin-left: 50px; } .form-label { font-weight: normal } .full-width { width: 100%; sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_bb8e351ddbe2fa0054d8ff621f961976
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>updateGDS</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonData = {};
	var body = request.body.data; 
	var method = body.method;
	var message = '';
	var gds_id = body.gds_id;
	var gdsp_id = body.gdsp_id;
	var ic_number = body.ic_number;
	var er_number = body.er_number;
	var gdsp_number = body.gdsp_number;
	var type = body.type;
	var tmp = '';
	
	var gr_gds_project = new GlideRecord('u_software_solution_gds_project_information');
	gr_gds_project.addQuery('sys_id', gds_id);
	gr_gds_project.query();
	gr_gds_project.next();
	if(method == 'add'){
		if(type == 'gdsp'){
			var gdsp = gr_gds_project.u_gdsp_status.toString();
			if(gdsp != null && gdsp.length > 0){
				gdsp = gdsp + "," + gdsp_number;
			}else{
				gdsp = gdsp_number;
			}
			tmp = gdsp;
			gr_gds_project.u_gdsp_status = gdsp;
		}else if(type == "ic"){
			var ic = gr_gds_project.u_ic_status.toString();
			if(ic != null && ic.length > 0){
				ic = ic + "," + ic_number;
			}else{
				ic = ic_number;
			}
			tmp = ic;
			gr_gds_project.u_ic_status = ic;
		}else if (type == 'er'){
			var er = gr_gds_project.u_er_status.toString();
			if(er != null && er.length > 0){
				er = er + "," + er_number ;
			}else{
				er = er_number;
			}
			tmp = er;
			gr_gds_project.u_er_status = er;
		}
	}
	if(method == 'remove'){
		if(type == 'gdsp'){
			var gdsp1 = gr_gds_project.u_gdsp_status.toString();
			var gdsps = gdsp1.split(",");
			var new_gdsps = '';
			var added = false;
			for(var i = 0; i < gdsps.length; i++){
				if(gdsps[i] != gdsp_number){
					if(added == true){
						new_gdsps = new_gdsps + ",";	
					}
					new_gdsps = new_gdsps +  gdsps[i];
					added = true;
				}
			}
			tmp = new_gdsps;
			gr_gds_project.u_gdsp_status = new_gdsps;
		}else if(type == "ic"){
			var ic1 = gr_gds_project.u_ic_status.toString();

			tmp = ic1;
			gr_gds_project.u_ic_status = ic1;
		}else if (type == 'er'){
			var er1 = gr_gds_project.u_er_status.toString();

			tmp = er1;
			gr_gds_project.u_er_status = er1;
		}	
	}
		
	gr_gds_project.update();		

    jsonData = {
		message: tmp
	};
	
	return jsonData;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gds/updateGDS</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updateGDS</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-04 19:05:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bb8e351ddbe2fa0054d8ff621f961976</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateGDS</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_bb8e351ddbe2fa0054d8ff621f961976</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-12 19:22:58</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gds">0cf2faafdbbd360054d8ff621f96197e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_2040eea6dbcaba00f59974131f96192c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getCatItem</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonData =[];
	//var name = 'CCR Genomic Data Sharing Plan';
	var name = request.queryParams.name;
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
		gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', name);
		gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
	var catId = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	jsonData.push({
		cat_item_id: catId
	}); 
    return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getCatItem</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getCatItem</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 22:16:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2040eea6dbcaba00f59974131f96192c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCatItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2040eea6dbcaba00f59974131f96192c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:19:15</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

/* Layout helpers

	display: none;
}
.ui-helper-hidden-accessible {
	border: 0;
	clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
	height: 1px;

}

}

}
.ui-helper-clearfix {

}

}

.ui-front {

}


/* Interaction Cues
----------------------------------*/
.ui-state-disabled {
	cursor: default !important;
}


/* Icons
----------------------------------*/

/* states and images */
.ui-icon {
	display: block;
	text-indent: -99999px;
	overflow: hidden;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
}


/* Misc visuals
----------------------------------*/

/* Overlays */
.ui-widget-overlay {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}
.ui-accordion .ui-accordion-header {

}

	padding: 0;
	line-height: normal;
	margin-right: .1em;

	vertical-align: middle;

.ui-button,
.ui-button:link,
.ui-button:visited,
.ui-button:hover,

}
/* to make room for the icon, a width needs to be set here */

}

}

}

}

/* states and images */

$('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e0bc379edb5e360054d8ff621f9619d3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>gsdspUtil</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var jsonArr = {};
	 var orgin_id = request.body.data.org_id;
	 var version = '1';
	 var ticket_num = request.body.data.ticket_number;
	 var ver = '';
	 var sys_id = ''; 
	 var method = request.body.data.method;

	 if (method == 'select'){
		 var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		 gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',orgin_id);
		 gr_tracking.query();
		 if(gr_tracking.getRowCount() > 0){
		   gr_tracking.next();
		   ver = gr_tracking.getValue('u_ticket_number'); 
		 }
	 }else if(method == 'withdraw'){
		  var id = request.body.data.id;
		  var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
		  gr.addQuery('sys_id',id); //to delete one record
		  gr.query();
		  gr.next();
		  gr.deleteRecord();
	 }else{
		var gr_tracking1 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		gr_tracking1.addQuery('u_orgid',orgin_id);
		gr_tracking1.query();
		if(gr_tracking1.getRowCount() > 0){
		   gr_tracking1.next();
		   ver = gr_tracking1.getValue('u_version');
		   sys_id = gr_tracking1.getValue('sys_id');
		   method = 'update';
		}else{
		   method = 'insert';
		}
		if(method == 'update'){
		   var gr_tracking2 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		   gr_tracking2.get(sys_id); 
		   ver =  (parseInt(ver) + 1).toFixed(0);
		   gr_tracking2.u_version = ver;
		   gr_tracking2.update();
		}
		if(method == 'insert'){
		   var gr_tracking3 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		   gr_tracking3.initialize();
		   gr_tracking3.u_orgid = orgin_id;
		   gr_tracking3.u_version = version;
		   gr_tracking3.u_ticket_number = ticket_num;
		   gr_tracking3.insert();
		   ver = version;
		}
	 }
	 jsonArr ={
		version: ver
	 };
	 return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/gsdspUtil</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/gsdspUtil</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-25 20:40:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e0bc379edb5e360054d8ff621f9619d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gsdspUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e0bc379edb5e360054d8ff621f9619d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:19:53</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

$('#submitButton').show(); $('#closeButton').hide(); } var ticketN = $('#'+number+'_ticket').val(); $('#displayRequestId').html(ticketN); $('#displayRequests').modal('show').on('shown.bs.modal', function(){$('#displayRequests .modal-content').scrollTop(0);}); } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } $('#hiddenStage').val(stage); } function clearDiv(){ $('#comments_div').hide(); $('#sd_div').hide(); $('#submitButton').hide(); $('#closeButton').hide(); } function parse(allcomments) { var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS"); var commentsblock = '' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } commentsblock = commentsblock + "
RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime
" + role + "" + approver + "" + results+ "" + comm + "" + t + "
"; return commentsblock; } function loadApprovalData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } return value; } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } function resetRequestValue(){ var i = 0; for( i = 0; i!= names.length; i++){ if(textFields.indexOf(names[i]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[i] + "1").html(''); }else{ $('#'+names[i] +"1").html(''); $('#'+names[i] + "1").prop('checked', false); $('#'+names[i] + "1").removeAttr("disabled"); } } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsegds-sd-approval-tablefalseGDS SD Approval Tablefalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-05-02 19:50:51truefac5b724dbe2ba00f59974131f9619bd2GDS SD Approval Tableglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_fac5b724dbe2ba00f59974131f9619bdzhoujim@nih.gov2017-05-03 15:02:47

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var names=['investigator','email','phone', 'date', 'projectNumber', 'projectName', 'simpleSize','prospective', 'restrospective', 'human', 'nonHuman', 'germLine','somatic', 'dnaType', 'rnaType',  'microbiome', 'mitochrondria', 'otherType', 'specifyOtherType', 'snpArrayData', 'numSNP', 'expressionArray', 'numExpression','methylationArray', 'numMethylation','arrayDerive', 'microarrayData', 'sequenceData', 'somaticSnv', 'arrayCgh', 'wholeGenome', 'wholeExome', 'targetGenome', 'targetExome', 'wholeTranscriptome', 'targetTrabscriptome', 'epigenomicMark', 'sanger', 'rrna', 'association', 'arrayDerivedExpression', 'rnaExpression', 'derivedMethylation', 'otherAnalysis', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'individual', 'aggregate', 'notApplicableDataForm', 'arrayExpress', 'cancerGenomics', 'clinVar', 'dbGap', 'dbSnp', 'dbVar', 'ena', 'genBank', 'geo', 'mgi', 'sra', 'traceArchive', 'wormbase', 'zfin', 'OtherRepository', 'specifiedRepository','phenotype', 'exposure', 'clinicalData', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'protocol', 'specifiedProtocol', 'instrument', 'specifiedInstrument', 'surveyTool', 'otherCompanion', 'specifiedCompanion', 'dataCheck', 'publication', 'otherSubmission', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'noHumanData', 'noLimitation','limitedOnly', 'limitedPurpose','relateToDisease','orginId', 'version','rat', 'mouse', 'celegans', 'drosophila', 'yeast', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteria', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther'];
 
	var jsonData = [];
	var data = request.body.data;
	var requested_for = data.requested_for;
	var opened_by = data.opened_by;
	var cat_item = data.cat_item;
	var short_description = data.short_description;
	var itemIds = data.variables;
	var contactType = data.contact_type;
	var investigator= data.investigator;
	var projectName= data.projectName;
	var resubmit = data.resubmit;
	var comments = data.comments;

	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
	gr_request.initialize();
	gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.requested_for = requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = opened_by;
	gr_request.contact_type = contactType;
	var request_id = gr_request.insert();

	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item.initialize();
	gr_requested_item.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_requested_item.cat_item = cat_item;
	gr_requested_item.short_description = short_description;
	gr_requested_item.request = request_id;
	gr_requested_item.contact_type = contactType;
	gr_requested_item.u_investigator = investigator;
	gr_requested_item.u_project_name = projectName;

	if(resubmit == 'true'){
		gr_requested_item.comments = comments;
	  }

	var submitted_id = gr_requested_item.insert();
	var number = gr_requested_item.number;

	for (x=0; x<names.length; x++) {
		var gr_answers = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
		gr_answers.initialize();
		gr_answers.item_option_new = itemIds[names[x]];
		gr_answers.value = data[names[x]];
		gr_answers.order = x+1;
		var answers_sys_id = gr_answers.insert();

		var gr_m2m = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option_mtom');
		gr_m2m.initialize();
		gr_m2m.sc_item_option = answers_sys_id;
		gr_m2m.request_item = submitted_id;
		gr_m2m.insert();
	  }

	var gr_requested_item2 = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item2.get(submitted_id);
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
	gr_requested_item2.due_date = gdt.getDisplayValue();
	gr_requested_item2.update();
	
	//get project ticket number
	var orginId = '';
	var tickerNum = '';
	var org_ticket_num = '';
	var version = '';
	var hasParent = '';
	var selectedOrginId = '';

	selectedOrginId = contactType;
	if(selectedOrginId == '' || selectedOrginId === undefined || selectedOrginId == 'Web' ){
		orginId = submitted_id;
		org_ticket_num = number;
		hasParent = 'false';
	}else{
		var orgIds = selectedOrginId.split("=");
		var gr_tracking_item = GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		gr_tracking_item.addQuery('u_orgid',orgIds[0]);
		gr_tracking_item.query();

		if(gr_tracking_item.getRowCount() > 0){
			gr_tracking_item.next();
			orginId = gr_tracking_item.u_orgid;
			org_ticket_num = gr_tracking_item.u_ticket_number;
			version = orgIds[1];
			hasParent = 'true';
		}else {
			orginId = submitted_id;
			org_ticket_num = number;
			hasParent = 'false';
		}
	}
	var ticket_number = '';
	if(hasParent == 'true'){
		ticket_number = 'CCR_GDSP' + org_ticket_num.substring(8) + '-' + version;
	}else{
		ticket_number = "CCR_GDSP" + gr_approval_items.sysapproval.number.substring(8);
	}	
	
	jsonData.push({
		id: submitted_id,
		number: number,
		ticketNum: ticket_number
	});
	
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/submitRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/submitRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 20:32:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>submitRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-04 19:41:52</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_df68eb6bdb71760054d8ff621f961909
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>saveProjectInformationService</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonData = [];
	var variables = {};
	var body = request.body.data; 
	var method = body[0].method;
	var message = '';
	
	if(method == 'save'){
		var save_request = new GlideRecord('u_software_solution_gds_project_information');
		save_request.initialize();
		save_request.u_user_id = body[0].userId;
		save_request.u_project_title = body[0].projectTitle;
		save_request.u_pi_first_name = body[0].piFirstName;
		save_request.u_pi_last_name = body[0].piLastName;
		save_request.u_pi_email = body[0].piEmail;
		save_request.u_pi_phone = body[0].piPhone;
		save_request.u_organism_type = body[0].organismType;
		save_request.u_gds_exception_request = body[0].erId;
		message = save_request.insert();
		save_request.addQuery('sys_id', message);
		save_request.query();
		save_request.next();
		var gds_number = save_request.getDisplayValue('u_number');
		jsonData.push({
			   gds_id: message,
			   gds_number: gds_number, 
		});
	}else if(method == 'update'){
		var id = body[0].gds_id;
		var update_request = new GlideRecord('u_software_solution_gds_project_information');	
		update_request.addQuery('sys_id',id);
		update_request.query();
		update_request.next();
		update_request.u_project_title = body[0].projectTitle;
		update_request.u_pi_first_name = body[0].piFirstName;
		update_request.u_pi_last_name = body[0].piLastName;
		update_request.u_pi_email = body[0].piEmail;
		update_request.u_pi_phone = body[0].piPhone;
		update_request.u_organism_type = body[0].organismType;
		update_request.u_gds_exception_request = body[0].erId;	
		message = update_request.update();
		jsonData.push({
		   gds_id: message,
		   gds_number: 'none',
		});
	}
	
	return jsonData;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gds/saveProjectInformationService</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/saveProjectInformationService</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-04 19:47:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>df68eb6bdb71760054d8ff621f961909</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveProjectInformationService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_df68eb6bdb71760054d8ff621f961909</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-06 17:44:39</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gds">0cf2faafdbbd360054d8ff621f96197e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_5933beafdbbd360054d8ff621f9619cd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="DELETE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getGDSProjectNumber</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonArr = [];
	var project_number = parseInt(gs.getPropery('gds.sequential.number'));
	gs.setProperty('gds.sequential.number', (project_number + 1));
	
	jsonArr.push({
		id: project_number
	});
	
	return jsonArr;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gds/getGDSProjectNumber</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getGDSProjectNumber</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-04 15:54:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5933beafdbbd360054d8ff621f9619cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getGDSProjectNumber</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_5933beafdbbd360054d8ff621f9619cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-04 18:41:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gds">0cf2faafdbbd360054d8ff621f96197e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>saveRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	  var jsonData = [];
	  var variables = {};
	  var body = request.body.data; 
	  var action = body.action;
	  var requested_for = body.requested_for;
	  var value = body.value;
	  var project_name = body.project_name;
	  var saved_id = body.saved_id;
	  var answers_sys_id = '';
	  var save_submission = '';
	
	  if (action != null && action == 'DELETE') {
		  if (saved_id != '') {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
			save_submission.query();
			save_submission.next();
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.deleteRecord();
		  }
	  }else {
		  if (saved_id=='') {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.initialize();
			save_submission.u_value = value;
			save_submission.u_userid = requested_for; 
			save_submission.u_project_name = project_name; 
			var comments = body.comments;
			save_submission.u_comments = comments;
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.insert();
		  }else {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
			save_submission.query();
			save_submission.next();

			save_submission.u_value = value;
			save_submission.u_userid = requested_for; 
			save_submission.u_project_name = project_name; 
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.update();
		  }
	  }
	  jsonData.push({
	  	projectName: project_name,
		value : saved_id,
		action: action
	  });
	  return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/saveRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/saveRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-12 21:04:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:20:17</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_d64bf894db46b60054d8ff621f961952
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getProjectInformation</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonArr = [];
    var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_software_solution_gds_project_information');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next() != null){
		jsonArr.push({
			projectId: gr.getDisplayValue('u_number'),
			projectTitle: gr.getDisplayValue('u_project_title'),
			piFirstName: gr.getDisplayValue('u_pi_first_name'),
			piLastName: gr.getDisplayValue('u_pi_last_name'),
			piEmail: gr.getDisplayValue('u_pi_email'),
			piPhone: gr.getDisplayValue('u_pi_phone'),
			organismType: gr.getDisplayValue('u_organism_type'),
			erId: gr.getDisplayValue('u_gds_exception_request'),
			gdsp_status: gr.getDisplayValue('u_gdsp_status'),
			ic_status: gr.getDisplayValue('u_ic_status'),
			er_status: gr.getDisplayValue('u_er_status'),
		});	
	}
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gds/getProjectInformation</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getProjectInformation</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-06 15:06:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d64bf894db46b60054d8ff621f961952</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getProjectInformation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_d64bf894db46b60054d8ff621f961952</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-12 15:54:27</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gds">0cf2faafdbbd360054d8ff621f96197e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>fetchSubmittedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonArr = {}; 
	 
	var requestedId = request.body.data.requestedid;
    var items = {};
	
	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item.addQuery('sys_id',requestedId );
	gr_requested_item.query();
	gr_requested_item.next();
	var variables = gr_requested_item.variables;
	for (key in variables) {
		items[variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName()] = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
	}
	var comments = '';

	comments =  gr_requested_item.comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
  
	jsonArr.variables = items;
	jsonArr.comments = comments;
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/fetchSubmittedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchSubmittedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-18 19:11:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4815a700db9abe0054d8ff621f9619c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchSubmittedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4815a700db9abe0054d8ff621f9619c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 15:19:03</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

$('#submitButton').show(); $('#closeButton').hide(); } var ticketN = $('#'+number+'_ticket').val(); $('#displayRequestId').html(ticketN); $('#displayRequests').modal('show').on('shown.bs.modal', function(){$('#displayRequests .modal-content').scrollTop(0);}); } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } $('#hiddenStage').val(stage); } function clearDiv(){ $('#comments_div').hide(); $('#sd_div').hide(); $('#submitButton').hide(); $('#closeButton').hide(); } function parse(allcomments) { var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS"); var commentsblock = '' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } commentsblock = commentsblock + "
RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime
" + role + "" + approver + "" + results+ "" + comm + "" + t + "
"; return commentsblock; } function loadApprovalData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } return value; } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } function resetRequestValue(){ var i = 0; for( i = 0; i!= names.length; i++){ if(textFields.indexOf(names[i]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[i] + "1").html(''); }else{ $('#'+names[i] +"1").html(''); $('#'+names[i] + "1").prop('checked', false); $('#'+names[i] + "1").removeAttr("disabled"); } } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsegdsp-gpa-tablefalseGDSP GPA Approval Tablefalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-04-17 14:43:10trued87f513bdb027e00f59974131f96199c167GDSP GPA Approval Tableglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_d87f513bdb027e00f59974131f96199czhoujim@nih.gov2017-05-02 19:55:31

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>deleteGDSRecord</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonData = [];
	var body = request.body.data;
	var id = body.id ;
	var gr1 = new GlideRecord('u_software_solution_gds_project_information');
		gr1.addQuery('sys_id', id);
		gr1.query();
		gr1.next();
		gr1.deleteRecord();
	jsonData.push({
			   message: "complete"
		});
	
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gds/deleteGDSRecord</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/deleteGDSRecord</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 21:15:18</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>10858d00db067600f59974131f96197b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>deleteGDSRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_10858d00db067600f59974131f96197b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-05 21:36:56</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gds">0cf2faafdbbd360054d8ff621f96197e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
